data.message:
Id give anything to work in the studio with you. I'm into audio production and recording and sound engineering. I'd sweep the floors to be around man. 

I remember when I was 14 and I would hit play and pause and write down all your lyrics to learn every song. You got me trough my childhood man. I related to your music because it spoke to so many of the emotions I felt growing up in a reality I could hardly make sense of.
